Title: Halloween H2O: 20 Years Later
Writer: Debra Hill (characters), John Carpenter (characters), Robert Zappia (story), Robert Zappia (screenplay), Matt Greenberg (screenplay)
Actors: Jamie Lee Curtis, Adam Arkin, Michelle Williams, Adam Hann-Byrd
Plot: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.
